Skills Gained During My Placement

Technical Skills

  • Proficient in PHP and the Laravel framework for web development.
  • Enhanced knowledge of database design and implementation.
  • Developed familiarity with version control systems like Git.
  • Improved debugging and problem-solving techniques.

Soft Skills

  • Gained experience in remote collaboration and time management.
  • Strengthened communication and teamwork skills.
  • Learned to adapt to challenges and take ownership of tasks.
